summary: A fast test suite that validates a Stable Diffusion XL pipeline combined with a single ControlNet model, checking component creation, weight initialization, attention slicing, control guidance toggling, batch‑vs‑single inference consistency, handling of negative prompts, optional component serialization, and xformers‑accelerated attention execution.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and efficiency of the multi‑ControlNet diffusion pipeline for image generation workloads, enabling rapid detection of regressions and performance issues before deployment.
